incidents.name: Incident 363 - Intermittent issues with loading and slowness

incident_updates.body:
Start Time: September 05, 2023 03:50 PM Pacific Time Zone
End Time: September 05, 2023 05:20 PM Pacific Time Zone (Note this fix can take up to 48 hours to propagate to all ISPs)
Description: Intermittent network issues causing issues with loading and slowness.

Status: We have seen no further occurrences of the issue.  We are now closing this matter.

Start Time: September 05, 2023 03:50 PM Pacific Time Zone
End Time: September 05, 2023 05:20 PM Pacific Time Zone

End Time: N/A
Description: Intermittent network issues causing sporadic problem with loading and slowness. Users may encounter issues loading their page.

Status: We are aware of a service disruption. Our teams are working to identify the cause and implement a solution.

incident_updates.body:
May 2020 Release. Making Bill.com better. 

We are performing system maintenance with an expected downtime of 4 hours. All systems will be offline until the completion of the maintenance period.
We will be performing system maintenance on our database with an expected downtime of 3 hours. All systems will be offline until the completion of the maintenance period.

April 2020 Release. Making Bill.com better. 

We are performing system maintenance with an expected downtime of 4 hours. All systems will be offline until the completion of the maintenance period.

March 2020 Release. Making Bill.com better. 

We are performing system maintenance with an expected downtime of 4 hours. All systems will be offline until the completion of the maintenance period.
We will be performing system maintenance on our database with an expected downtime of 30 minutes. All systems will be offline until the completion of the maintenance period.
We identified an issue that resulted in temporary slow response times. This issue has now been resolved and all systems are fully operational.
We identified an issue that resulted in temporary slow response times.  All systems are now fully operational.
February 2020 Release. Making Bill.com better. We are performing system maintenance.
We will be performing system maintenance on our database with an expected downtime of 4 hours. All systems will be offline until the completion of the maintenance period.
